article_title: Greeley man, 70, dies in motorcycle crash – The Denver Post
article_text:
Weld County authorities on Sunday identified a 70-year-old Greeley man who died Saturday after crashing his motorcycle east of the city.

Weld County Coroner’s officials said Jessie Janway of Greeley was pronounced dead at North Colorado Medical Center after arriving there in critical condition Saturday afternoon.

Janway lost control of his motorcycle taking a turn on East 18th Street near U.S. Highway 34, officials said. His motorcycle went off the road and hit a wall. Janway stopped by a pond and the motorcycle went into the pond, authorities said.

og.description: Greeley man, 70, dies in motorcycle crash

article_summary:
Weld County authorities on Sunday identified a 70-year-old Greeley man who died Saturday after crashing his motorcycle east of the city.
Janway stopped by a pond and the motorcycle went into the pond, authorities said.
His motorcycle went off the road and hit a wall.
Weld County Coroner’s officials said Jessie Janway of Greeley was pronounced dead at North Colorado Medical Center after arriving there in critical condition Saturday afternoon.
Janway lost control of his motorcycle taking a turn on East 18th Street near U.S. Highway 34, officials said.
